post.text: The question in this election: Who can put the plans into action that will make your life better?

comment.author: Taylor
comment.text: Where is her pin? Just wondering.

replies.author: Taylor
replies.text: All US presidents or candidates have worn them. Part of their image. Perception of her loyalty. Not required by law, but by office she is seeking right?

replies.author: Ryan
replies.text: Kevin Actually, tax returns are not a requirement. Doing research before posting can help you not look so stupid
